definition[0]: a scene in a film, play, book etc that shows something that happened before that point in the story
example[0]: The events of the heroâ€™s childhood are shown as a series of flashbacks.
definition[1]: a sudden very clear memory of something that happened to you in the past
example[1]: Eaton still has flashbacks of the crash.
definition[2]: an occasion when someone has the same bad feeling that they had when they took an illegal drug in the past
example[2]: Many users of this drug experience flashbacks.
definition[3]: a burning gas or liquid that moves back into a tube or container
